hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:A person came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and told him that he was always betrayed in purchasing. The Prophet (ﷺ) told him to say at the time of buying, "No cheating

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الْخِدَاعِ فِي الْبَيْعِ
chapter.eng-name: What is disliked as regards cheating in business
